fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Mujhe GST invoice milega kya?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan, Startup Squad Pvt. Ltd. se proper GST invoice milta hai jisse aap ITC claim kar sakte ho.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Kya aap legal import proof de sakte ho?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan, agar client chahe to Bill of Entry aur DDP clearance proof share kiya ja sakta hai.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Kya aap mere brand ke naam se product de sakte ho?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan, private label ya neutral packaging bulk quantity ke liye arrange ki ja sakti hai.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Aap USD mein quote dete ho ya INR mein?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Supplier hume USD mein deta hai, par hum client ko INR mein hi final quotation dete hain including all import costs.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Distributor price ya resale margin mil sakta hai kya?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan, bulk aur recurring clients ke liye reseller pricing available hai.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Main Delhi se khud pickup kar sakta hoon kya?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan bilkul, NCR clients warehouse se directly pickup kar sakte hain.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Kya aap all India delivery karte ho?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan, Delhi se hum domestic courier arrange kar dete hain. Extra courier charge lagega city ke hisaab se.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Part payment allowed hai kya?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Single piece orders ke liye full payment lena padta hai. Bulk clients ke liye part payment discuss hota hai.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Kya 1 piece order kar sakte hain ya bulk hi lena padta hai?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Aap single piece bhi le sakte ho, koi minimum quantity nahi hai. Bulk order pe better pricing milti hai.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Product kahaan se ship hota hai?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Shipment China warehouse se hota hai aur DDP Delhi tak hum handle karte hain. Customs aur clearance hum karte hain.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Payment kahan aur kaise karna hai?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Payment company ke account mein hota hai – UPI, bank transfer ya Razorpay link se. Details quotation mein hoti hain.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Order ke baad mujhe kaunse documents milenge?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Aapko milta hai – Proforma Invoice, Final Tax Invoice, Payment Receipt aur Shipment Tracking. Bulk order pe import proof bhi.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Kya mujhe customs duty alag se deni padegi?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Nahi, DDP mein sab customs aur import duties included hain. Aapko sirf invoice + GST pay karna hota hai.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Catalog ya brochure mil sakta hai kya?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan, humare paas updated product catalog aur specification sheet available hai.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Product pe koi warranty milti hai kya?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan, 1-year manufacturer warranty hoti hai (motor aur main board cover). Physical damage cover nahi hota.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Agar product damaged aaya to kya hoga?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Product damaged aane pe hum replace ya repair karwa dete hain. Shipment insurance included hota hai.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Delivery kitne din mein milti hai?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Normally 18–25 din lagte hain China se Delhi tak. Hum tracking bhi share karte hain jab shipment dispatch hota hai.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Jo price diya hai kya usme GST include hai?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Nahi, GST (18%) extra lagta hai. Price DDP Delhi basis pe hai – matlab customs clear hone ke baad ka cost.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Sirf massagers ya aur products bhi supply karte ho?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Abhi focus massagers pe hai, lekin humare China supplier se aur bhi categories DDP basis pe supply kar sakte hain.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): DDP ka matlab kya hota hai?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): DDP (Delivered Duty Paid) ka matlab hai supplier se India tak saara import aur customs hum handle karte hain – client ko sirf invoice pay karna hota hai.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Kya mujhe quotation pehle milega?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan, har order ke liye Proforma Quotation send hota hai jisme sab cost clear likha hota hai (DDP + GST).

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Warranty service India mein milti hai kya?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan, Delhi service partner handle karta hai saare warranty aur repair cases.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Ye same model Alibaba ya dusre sites pe bhi milta hai kya?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Haan, same manufacturer ka product hai. Hum DDP delivery aur warranty ke saath India mein available karte hain.

fields.Client Question (Customer Puchega): Ye product India mein banta hai ya import hota hai?
fields.Employee Answer (Response Summary): Ye product directly China factory se import hota hai DDP Delhi basis pe. Saare customs aur duties included hote hain.
